query:
UPDATE product_variants 
SET 
  stripePriceId = CASE 
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-90' THEN 'price_1SicHTDHegvEeKVXfvfKPM2E'
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-180' THEN 'price_1SicHVDHegvEeKVXgf6yKo8T'
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-270' THEN 'price_1SicHdDHegvEeKVXqqYYmyMV'
  END,
  stripeSubscriptionPriceId = CASE 
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-90' THEN 'price_1SicHUDHegvEeKVXGlhnKH3E'
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-180' THEN 'price_1SicHaDHegvEeKVXDi5mR6GW'
    WHEN sku = 'OPTIBIO-ASH-270' THEN 'price_1SicHeDHegvEeKVXMH8n1C4k'
  END
WHERE sku IN ('OPTIBIO-ASH-90', 'OPTIBIO-ASH-180', 'OPTIBIO-ASH-270');
